column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Next up was a short rib of some kind with mashed potatoes and onion bulbs. The short rib melted in your MOUTH. I can't remember the taste of the sauce off the top of my head
column2: but holy COW- it was delicious. The mashed potatoes were creamy and whipped. And the onion bulbs were soft but crisp at the edges.
